name: Cubed Together
description:
Puzzle game with very simple graphics created for GMTK GameJam 2021 by Mukhavertolet

In this puzzle-platformer you can do... nothing.
You can't do anything until you pick up at least one little cube.
Each of these cubes let you use their abilities, and if you have more than one of same type, their effect increases! With this mechanic cubes Join together to help you pass 6 levels
